description: Trump once pledged to hire “the best people,” but his tenure has been plagued with record-high departures. What if the zany characters who left Trump’s world – including two guilty federal criminals – starred in an 1980s-style sitcom?
title: President Trump’s Best People
title_page: President Trump’s Best People - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Trump once pledged to hire “the best people,” but his tenure has been plagued with record-high departures. What if the zany characters who left Trump’s world – including two guilty federal criminals – starred in an 1980s-style sitcom?
